Game.Name: Zhu Zhu Pets 2- Featuring the Wild Bunch
Game.Plot: Zhu Zhu Pets: Featuring the Wild Bunch (also known as Zhu Zhu Pets 2: Featuring the Wild Bunch or simply Zhu Zhu Pets 2) is a video game for the Nintendo DS and the Wii. It is the first (and currently only) Zhu Zhu Pets game for Wii, and is also the first Zhu Zhu Pets platformer (the Wii version)
